name: Colour Mine
description:
An Evil Wizard stole your colours. Go deeper and deeper, to gather the colours one by one and defeat the Evil Wizard. Each colour has its own powers and abilities that will help you in your quest.

  • Use [A] and [D] to move.
  • Use [W] to jump.
  • Use [SPACE] to interact and use your abilities once you unlock them.
  • Switch colours by [J],[K] and [L] once you unlock them.
